name: Dessert Delivery
description:
Just a quick & simple minigame I made while learning Unity. 

How To Play  Deliver

Deliver desserts to the correct houses using arrow keys to drive. Each delivery adds $100. The game is over if any treat has not been picked up by 15 seconds (it will turn orange at 5s, then red at 10s). Esc button to pause/resume the game.
